Content: The Navy has seized more than 11 kilograms of Gold while on patrol in Kalpitiya, Kudaawa sea area. The Navy has arrested two suspects in the ages of 33 and 29 and seized a Dinghy boat used to transport Gold. The suspects and the Gold have been handed over to the Colombo Customs Office. The Navy has seized 62 kilograms of illegal Gold during their operations last year.
